name: The Drop (Space Lizard)
description:
THE DROP is a roguelike first released in 2013, and made in RPG Maker VX Ace. It is a followup to the "Reconstruction" series released in 2009.

This game is no longer in active development. I am sharing it here to fix a critical issue that has cropped up in more recent versions of Windows. Enjoy!

VERSION 1.4 (Updated March 31st, 2020): This version includes a fix to allow keyboard shortcuts to work on modern computers. It also includes a small buff to the stats of custom characters, which should make things easier for young adventurers.

See more of my work at www.spacelizard.dev or contact me on twitter at @sungazersoft.

(April 2nd) The previous download had an issue with achievements and bestiary data. This is fixed in the latest download.
